parameters.name: Traverseflag
parameters.description: True to traverse down into all dependent files, false for only the highest level within the dependencies

parameters.name: Searchflag
parameters.description: True to apply the current search criteria, false to return the dependent file information as it was stored

title: IModelDoc2.GetNumDependencies
description: Gets the number of strings returned by IModelDoc2::GetDependencies2.
signature:
System.Int32 GetNumDependencies( 
   System.Int32
Traverseflag
,
   System.Int32
Searchflag
)

parameters.name: Traverseflag
parameters.description: True to traverse down into all dependent files, false for only the highest level within the dependencies

parameters.name: Searchflag
parameters.description: True to apply the current search criteria, false to return the dependent file information as it was stored

returns: Number of strings returned by IModelDoc2::GetDependencies2
